text: We are thrilled that Dr. Scott Weiss, director at @MassGenBrigham #PersonalizedMedicine, will be speaking at our Make Shift Happen with ED&I event on 3/1. Join us to explore what we can do to prioritize #equity during the #COVID19 #Vaccine rollout – https://t.co/Hd4F2M267V https://t.co/AExu9fv0kY
